Text.Value: You still have the wits to recognise your betters. Good.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The figure draws back her cowl. A drow woman. Ageless, elegant. Silver hair, cruel eyes. Viconia.
EditorData.SFXTags: Off camera sound of Cowl being drawn back to reveal face

Text.Value: Remain silent.
What's going on? Is this part of the Mapping?
The artefact. I was sent to retrieve it. At any cost.
Give me the honour of my name. In full.
Do you know why you are here?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PN] player stands and shadowheart walks and sits down in their place
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player leaves the stone bench and Shadowheart takes their place

Text.Value: A projection. Let us find her in the flesh, then - so I can give her a hug.

EditorData.NodeContext: Unsurprised to see her old enemy dissipate before her. Sarcastic.

Text.Value: I know what's in that head of yours better than you do, girl. My name.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PN] Hooded figure gets up and stands in front of shadowheart
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The cloaked figure stands and looms over Shadowheart

Text.Value: And who tasked you with this mission?
You cow her so easily? I had thought I sensed more strength to her. Perhaps not... We shall begin.
I have a mission to fulfil. I must -
Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in what is to come.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

Text.Value: An astral projection. It is just like a DeVir to avoid facing danger in the flesh. They always were a family of cowards.

EditorData.NodeContext: DeVir (de'vɪə) - a drow noble house that Minthara has no love for. Scornful.

Text.Value: I... I can't. My memories -
Go ahead.
Mother Superior... Viconia DeVir.
You seek to be Unburdened, yes? The Mapping of the Heart can reveal the way... yet there is another here whose need is great.
An astral projection. Very clever. I'll stay on my toes around this one.
An astral projection. We should take this one seriously - she's clever by half.

EditorData.stateContext: Shadowheart is seated on the stone bench next to a hooded Viconia.

Text.Value: Keep back, Shadowheart.
Now if all our roles are clear, answer me. What is your true purpose?
Viconia DeVir. If only Shar would bless me with the forgetting of your face.

EditorData.NodeContext: Viconia and Jaheira are old enemies, sometimes allies. Not outright hatred between them, just vague dislike and even vaguer respect. Jaheira is responding to the fact that despite her memory loss, Shadowheart still recongises Viconia.

Text.Value: You had a mission, yes. But did you succeed? Or did you stray? Now give me the true answer - what is your purpose in being here?
I am the one who asks the questions. She is the one who answers. You are the one who remains silent.

EditorData.stateContext: Player is seated upon a stone bench

Text.Value: She hides behind a projection. It's time we find the Mother Superior in flesh.
Who are you?
Why map what is already known? Beside me is an ungrateful heart, a conniving heart, a shadow heart.
An astral projection. Seems she's taking no chances with us.
Now descend - you have much to answer for.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Viconia's image fades away - an astral projection.
EditorData.SFXTags: SFX to match the projection fading

Text.Value: Loss is a gift, girl. Do you still not understand that? Now give me the true answer - what is your purpose in being here?
Why map what is already known? A disloyal heart, a craven heart, a shadow heart.
An astral projection? Clever girl, she's not taking any chances. We shouldn't either.
Now answer - what is your true purpose?
You! Boo would have recognised your foul scent, if not for all this evil Sharran incense.
A GHOST! Wait, no. A projection, says Boo.

EditorData.NodeContext: Loud overreaction to Viconia's projection fading away, then immediate correction. Not bashful at all - OBVIOUSLY it's a projection, he knew that.

Text.Value: An astral projection...? Cunning of her. Not to mention untrusting.
There is something I lost... no, had taken from me. My family. My life. I want it all back -
The Mother Superior, of Shar's... It's you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking to
EditorData.NodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

Text.Value: That voice... Allow me. I think I'm supposed to do this.

Synopsis: Shadowheart meets with Viconia who is still hooded. However Viconia soon reveals who she is and invites Shadowheart to speak down below in the Grotto.
